title: Strategies for Improving Academic Achievement Through Metacognition and Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic psychological knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Long-term course for in-service professionals conducted in a smartphone-dominant limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can set personal learning goals and develop weekly action plans using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can evaluate their comprehension and strategy appropriateness during the learning process by applying metacognitive monitoring techniques.
Learners can apply and assess environmental regulation strategies for improving academic achievement in practical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
